upmc.ll.yourdata.deleteregistration.text: You can delete your user account via the link below. Please note that you will lose access to the Mercedes me Portal once you have deleted your account. Furthermore, Mercedes me connect services in all vehicles linked to your account will be deactivated for both main user and co-users.
Are you sure you want to deactivate extended data protection for your user account?

Note: If you subsequently wish to reactivate extended data protection, please contact your authorised Mercedes-Benz dealer.
